summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 INTRIGUE COOK'S DELIGHT COACH.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MOTOR HOME  WAS EQUIPPED WITH CREEPING WINDOWS.  THE THREE PASSENGER'S  SIDE WINDOWS,  AND TWO DRIVER'S  SIDE WINDOWS  FROSTED AND THE VISIBILITY  WAS POOR.  THE MANUFACTURER DIAGNOSED THE FAILURE AS DEFECTIVE SEALS, BUT WILL NOT REPLACE THEM BECAUSE OF THE AGE OF THE MOTOR HOME.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE 42,500.*AK  UPDATED 04/30/07. *JB

2000 40' COUNTRY COACH INTRIGUE #11116 MILEAGE 42,500.  THE WINDOWS WERE MANUFACTURED BY CE GI CORPORATION.  THE WINDOWS  WERE DEFECTIVE AND CREEPING.  BECAUSE OF THEY RESTRICTED  OUR VISION.  THESE WINDOWS HAVE BEEN DEFECTIVE IN MOTOR HOMES OF ALL MAKES AND MODELS, NOT JUST IN COUNTRY COACHES.  THE COMPANY HAS BEEN NOTIFIED FOR YEARS BY CUSTOMERS OF ALL MOTOR HOMES AND THE COMPANY REFUSED  FIRST TO CORRECT THE SITUATION , AND SECOND TO COMPENSATE CUSTOMERS OF MOTOR HOMES AFFECTED BY THEIR DEFECTS.  *AK

WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH ON FREEWAY 101 SOUTH @ GILROY,CA. THE FRONT LEFT TOYO TIRE BLEW OUT CAUSING DAMAGE TO LEFT SIDE OF MY 2000 COUNTRY COACH.  A NEW TIRE WAS INSTALLED AND TRAVEL WAS RESUMED. I TOOK PHOTOS OF TIRE AND I HAVE A PIECE OF THE TREAD. *JB
